dcterms:description: A synthetic dataset consisting of sequences where each letter is shifted by a fixed number in the alphabet, generating a target sequence that does not overlap with the source sequence.
dcterms:title: Shifting Alphabetic Sequences

dcterms:description: A synthetic dataset based on Caesar's cipher, where each letter in the source sequence is replaced by a letter some fixed number of positions down the alphabet, allowing for a diverse range of input sequences.
dcterms:title: Caesarâ€™s Cipher
